about_the_game:
N.R.V. is a frantic and violent top-down shooter set in a dark cyberpunk universe.

Blending FAST-PACED ACTION, UNBRIDLED VIOLENCE, and an OPPRESSIVE DYSTOPIAN WORLD, N.R.V. throws you into a desperate fight against a future ruled by ruthless elites and divine AIs.

Every bullet you fire and every enemy you take down brings you closer to the truth... or to your downfall.

Avenge! Lead the Revolution!

Fueled by the thirst for revenge, driven by a burning hatred that consumes you. Crush the elite and the divine AIs reigning from the towering heights of a sprawling Arcology.

A symbol of rebellion:Your actions will inspire the masses and ignite the flames of revolution. Free the citizens and become the avatar of an unstoppable popular fury ready to overthrow the Silicos, the ultra-rich who control the Arcology.
How far will you go?

Every liberated sector is a bloody victory against endless waves of enemies: grotesque cybermutants, ruthless mercenaries, and impenetrable security systems.
The real question remains:
Who’s truly pulling the strings? The Silicos… or something less human?

Your brutality, your fury! No mercy !

Dive into fast and intense gameplay where every second is a fight for survival. No respite: a single mistake is paid in blood.

Run, shoot, and crush your enemies in a cathartic ballet of hyperviolence. Each battle is an adrenaline-fueled explosion where only your skill and arsenal make the difference.

Unlock destructive weapons and enhance yourself with cybernetic upgrades: shields, dashes, hyperspeed, hacking. Adapt your playstyle to survive relentless hordes.

Switch between an oppressive physical world and an enigmatic digital realm, a sinister reflection of reality.

Every moment is a challenge. Every fight, a carnage.
How far will you go to survive?

Explore the Ruins of Their Hope!

Venture into a dystopian world where technology, corruption, and inhumanity are deeply intertwined.

The reflection of a failed futureThe Arcology, designed to unite humans and AIs against climate catastrophes, has succumbed to human greed and decaying infrastructure.

A diverse world, an omnipresent oppressionFrom industrial underbelly sectors choked by the roar of machines, to the corrupt streets of the pleasure district ruled by crime syndicates that numb the masses, to the fungal ruins of a city devoured by failed experiments, and up to the decadent heights of the ultra-rich: each sector is teeming with dangers, secrets to uncover, and formidable bosses to defeat.

The grip of divine AIsAIs are worshipped as deities, dominating every aspect of society. Some are benevolent, others tyrannical, and a few have created "children"—unpredictable AIs that sometimes escape their control, amplifying the chaos of this world.

A Rampant CorruptionA mysterious force is infiltrating the heart of the Arcology. Is it a digital virus? A parasitic entity? Or something even more elusive?
It spreads chaos, corrupting everything in its path. Will you find its source? Destroy it? Exploit it? Or will you become its puppet?

Their Beat, Our Riot!

Immerse yourself in a unique soundscape, driven by a dark and oppressive industrial darkwave. Every beat heightens the intensity of combat and the arcology’s suffocating atmosphere, pulling you deeper into this cyberpunk world.

Your ascent to the top of the arcology will decide the fate of its inhabitants. Rise against oppression, uncover the truth, and shape the future.

So… Salvation or Oblivion?

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Description

N.R.V. contains content that may not be suitable for all audiences. The game features:

-- Intense gunfights with depictions of blood splatter and exagerated violence.
-- A grim and dystopian setting that explores themes of societal collapse, moral ambiguity, and survival in a cyberpunk world.
-- Harsh language in dialogue and environmental storytelling, reflecting the brutality of the game’s universe.

While the game does not include sexual content, its focus on visceral combat and mature themes is intended for players aged 18 and older. 
Viewer and parental discretion are advised.

short_description: NRV is a frenetic and violent top-down shooter set in a grim cyberpunk universe that feels like a boomer shooter from top down view. Fueled by rage and by a thirst for revenge, you will slain waves of enemies and liberate the city to save the citizens from a cynical elite that seeks to enslave them.
